Table.LabelDesc: 读取地址栏参数template=模板名,将页面上所有TextBox控件的值,发送给OutToWord.aspx. Word中用$+控件ID占位.例:$Year
Table.LabelContent:
<script type="text/javascript">
      var template;
      $().ready(function () {
      template = getParam("template");
      });
      function outToWord() {
      if(!template){alert('未指定模板');return;}
      arr = $("input[type=text]");
      param = "";
      for (i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
      $input = $(arr[i]);
      param += $input.attr("id") + ":" + $input.val() + ",";
      }
      window.open("/OutToWord.aspx?template=" + escape(template) + "&jsonData=" + param);
      }
      function getParam(paramName) {
      paramValue = "";
      isFound = false;
      if (this.location.search.indexOf("?") == 0 && this.location.search.indexOf("=") > 1) {
      arrSource = decodeURI(this.location.search).substring(1, this.location.search.length).split("&");
      i = 0;
      while (i < arrSource.length && !isFound) {
      if (arrSource[i].indexOf("=") > 0) {
      if (arrSource[i].split("=")[0].toLowerCase() == paramName.toLowerCase()) {
      paramValue = arrSource[i].split("=")[1];
      isFound = true;
      }
      }
      i++;
      }
      }
      return paramValue;
      }
      </script>
